mapper.select: SELECT sum(unumber)/243 as unumber FROM CUSTOMER WHERE SNUMBER between 1 and 200
SELECT sum(unumber)/243 as unumber FROM CUSTOMER WHERE SNUMBER between 200 and 300
SELECT sum(unumber)/243 as unumber FROM CUSTOMER WHERE SNUMBER between 300 and 400
SELECT sum(unumber)/243 as unumber FROM CUSTOMER WHERE SNUMBER between 400 and 500
